story.narrative: In order to buy goods through website As a user I want to have an ability to add items into the cart
story.name: rozetka_scenarios.story
story.scenarios: Scenario:test when delivery cost is 35 UAH Given product page https://www.rozetka.com.ua And I am logged in on the product page And I add the items into the cart by pressing the button-Buy When the sum of items in the cart is less than 1500 UAH Then the delivery cost is 35 UAH

stepMatch.annotatedPattern: I am logged in on the product page

use.scenario: test when delivery cost is 35 UAH
use.step: And I am logged in on the product page
